title: PermissionRequest Hook Output Schema
description: Output schema for the PermissionRequest hook event. Uses hookSpecificOutput with a nested 'decision' object containing 'behavior' (allow/deny). Allow decisions can include updatedInput and updatedPermissions. Deny decisions can include a message and interrupt flag. IMPORTANT: PermissionRequest hooks do NOT fire in non-interactive mode (-p).

hookSpecificOutput.description: Event-specific output for PermissionRequest. Contains the decision object with behavior and conditional fields.

decision.description: The permission decision. Contains 'behavior' plus conditional fields based on the behavior value.

updatedInput.description: Modifies tool input before execution. Only valid when behavior is 'allow'.

updatedPermissions.description: Applies permission rule updates, equivalent to the user selecting 'always allow'. Only valid when behavior is 'allow'.

tool.description: Tool name to apply the permission rule to.

message.description: Tells Claude why the permission was denied. Only valid when behavior is 'deny'.

interrupt.description: If true, stops Claude entirely. Only valid when behavior is 'deny'.
